DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the preliminary efficacy of a 10-minute therapy dog visitation (TDV) in reducing biobehavioral stress responses.
DOC.brief_title: Biobehavioral Effects of Therapy Dog Visitation in Elderly Intensive Care Unit Patients: A Pilot and Feasibility Study
DOC.criteria: able to provide consent and understand English able to complete study instruments able to provide saliva specimens currently taking hormone replacement or steroidal antiinflammatory medications, in contact precautions at facility, diagnosed with Addison's or Cushing's disease fears or phobias to dogs, or allergies to dogs.
